Instruction: 'Slice the bagel in half and toast until golden brown.'
'Spread hummus on each half of the toasted bagel.'
'Layer cucumber slices on top of the hummus.'
'Arrange tomato slices on top of the cucumber.'
'Top with sliced red bell pepper and red onion.'
'Add sprouts on top of the vegetables.'
Season with salt and pepper, if desired.'
'Serve immediately and enjoy your fresh and flavorful veggie and hummus bagel!'
